title: Common Widget Properties and Events
description: Properties and events supported by all widgets except Action.

enabled.description: Whether the widget can be operated.

layoutData.description: Specifies how the widget should be arranged in a layout. See [Layout](layout).

font.description: The font used for the widget.

backgroundImage.description: An image to be displayed on the widget's background. If the image is smaller than the widget, it will be tiled.

bounds.description: The actual location and size of the widget, relative to its parent.

opacity.description: Opacity of the entire widget. Can be used for fade animations.

transform.description: Modifications to the widget's shape, size, or position. Can be used for animations.

highlightOnTouch.description: Whether the entire widget should be highlighted while touched.

touchstart.description: Fired when a widget is touched. See [Touch Events](touch-events).

touchmove.description: Fired repeatedly while swiping across the screen. See [Touch Events](touch-events).

touchend.description: Fired when a touch ends on the same widget than it started on. See [Touch Events](touch-events).

touchcancel.description: Fired instead of touchend when the touch ends on another widget than it started on. See [Touch Events](touch-events).

longpress.description: Fired after pressing a widget for a specific amount of time (about a second). See [Touch Events](touch-events).

change:bounds.description: Fired when the widget's size or position has changed.

dispose.description: Fired when the widget is about to be disposed.
